title: Simple and Effective
text: Has always worked flawlessly for me. Would be great to have the option for an extra passcode lock for the app, though.

title: The app doesn’t shows the login location
text: The app always ask me to sign in my accounts but it doesn’t shows which device is asking for that. It makes me confuse. I mean if there are some bad guy wanna login my accounts and the app just pop up a request wanna me sign in?

title: Works well/live the back up…but
text: Love it compared to other 2FA apps…but it’s unwieldy with all my accounts. Please add a folder grouping to make organizing easier.

title: Unclear reason for instructions
text: I was accessing an account and was directed to allow filling from Authenticator, then it automatically added an old email address that I’ve been transitioning out of, with no option to delete it. I suspected this email had been hacked and was trying to remove it from all my accounts.

title: The Worst App
text: Absolutely mind boggling to me that Microsoft Authenticator tries to get you to authenticate the account you are trying to link, using Microsoft Authenticator, as you are trying to set up Microsoft Authenticator. And that a simple google search will show that this is a common problem of people getting stuck in an infinite loop. If I could give this app a -10 star review, I would.

title: Apple support
text: The iPhone support group at the West Couny mall is always helpful in solving any problem I have with my Apple iPhone.  They are polite and direct you how to solve the problems.  Grateful for their assistance.

title: Does not allow selecting browser, which my employer requires
text:
Tthe Microsoft authenticator opens links in Safari. My employer then requires me to authenticate before going on. This authentication page blocks everything but Edge.
So, this app urgently needs a setting to control which browser it uses to open links.

title: Microsoft authenticater
text: This app took over all my pass me re-enter them all!  When I deleted the app I still had to figure out how to restore my iPhone password manager. I only downloaded because Microsoft was sending me in circles to get into words and they said this is what I had to do. No warning  that it would take over or how to reverse. So frustrating.

title: Wrong name
text: This should be called “OneWorkplace” because all the web front-end is called “OneWorkplace” super confusing that the app is named differently. I mean I’m aware MS has absolutely no concept of semantics or UX but hey, since you don’t QA your products you can save money be releasing beta software and use feedback and forums to gather bug reports and complaints.

title: Could be great..
text:
Really needs to support note fields for passwords at a minimum. Also would be nice to see labels/tagging/grouping. And a dark mode for the app would be nice too!

And it’d be nice to get actually release notes in the version history, having every single version have to notes read “We're always working on new features, bug fixes, and
performance improvements. Make sure you stay
updated with the latest version for the best
authentication experience.” Just seems silly.

title: simple/great to use
text: Great app - just make sure to go into settings and disable "show codes" -- my only advice. Other than that, it's perfect.

title: Stuck in an infinite loop
text: I need to sign into my Microsoft account but in order to do that I need to approve the sign in on this app, we’ll in order to approve the sign in on the app I need to be signed into my account on the app & in order to sign into my account on the app I need to approve the sign in on the app. So basically I’m stuck in an infinite loop & honestly this app is stupid for allowing the loop to exist.

title: You need authenticate to sign in. You need to sign in to authenticate
text: I tried to set up a new device for my school and to sign in to outlook I must open authenticator to verify, but authenticator also requires me to authenticate using the same app. It’s an endless loop and it makes no sense. Even the “I can’t use authenticator options” still require you to use the authenticator app.

title: Good app
text: These apps are very good. Sometimes the OTP of Facebook does not come. This has helped me a lot. Thank you for the one time password. Thank you Microsoft team for such a beautiful app.

title: Great App. Missing one thing.
text: Love the app. Please add a context search bar to the top. When there are many accounts it’s a pain to find the right one.

title: Not working with Apple Watch
text: This app would get five stars if they could get the Apple Watch problem figured out. Currently you can’t approve authentication requests from the Watch. Watch OS7 created the problem but users are still waiting...

title: Don’t use this app! You’ll lose access to all accounts!
text: If you use this Authenticator for any accounts and get a new PHONE (I got the iPhone 12)without backing up. You’ll lose access to every account that is linked. I got locked out of my Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and OnlyFans... can’t even restore password without using my 2 factor Authenticator... I’m losing a lot of money because of this rubbish app.

title: History
text: I like the convenience of the app but it would be great if I can access history alerts.  I received a iPhone notification that someone tried to sign into one of my accounts in the middle of the night. When I went into the app there’s no place to review.

title: App is crashing
text: Since I can’t an easy way to let anyone know through another channel, I will do so through here. App was working flawlessly forever, but all of a sudden it crashes at startup when there an auth event pending. I already submitted the crash reports, please fix ASAP as this app becomes useless as is. Hopefully I will be able to update my review to 5 stars after the fix

title: Passwords lost
text: Great app overall, love the idea of a secure app for everything you may need. However, every time I try to use the passwords function, within a week or two all of my passwords disappear and I have to retype everything.

title: It’s time for dark mode
text: It’s time. It would probably be the easiest app ever to update and almost all others have been updated. Working on call and having to pull up that bright white screen isn’t great.

title: Title is Authenticator needs to say Microsoft Authenticator
text: The challenge is to distinguish between Authenticator apps on iPhone. The listed name is just Authenticator. The same is true for other Authenticator apps. No way to tell them apart once installed. That creates a problem. How hard would it be to display a longer name or use Microsoft logo in icon?

title: Losing your OTP is easy
text: If you login with your existing account you lose your OTP keys, you need to use he recovery  method instead of signing in.  They made it too easy to overwrite your backup by accident.

title: I’m glad I found a way to authorize with a text message
text: My school uses this doo doo app and I was suffering with it for a year until I found out I could authenticate with a text message now. No more problems with signing in since then. This is the most useless, anxiety-provoking app even made because it would only work about 50% of the time.

title: Works great, not the best experience
text: App works great. Easy to use and integrate with other apps. But once you start connecting a lot of apps, it’s hard to find the codes you need. Just add a search option to make it infinitely easier to use.

title: Could be better
text: I'm required to use this app for work purposes.  But I'm not sure why Microsoft has an apple watch version as it does not work.  When I attempt to use the watch app it always says failed to communicate with app.

title: Best Authenticator App Around
text: Since COVID-19 I’ve had to setup remote access for almost 1000 employees. This app has been the easiest one to explain how to use for all of my technically-impaired employees...thank you for the ease of access!!

title: LESS THAN HORRIBLE
text: This app is supposed to make things easier for you to access and get around your account correct? WRONG! Because of this absolutely trash app I can no longer sign into my own account because everytime I try it says “something went wrong” and locks me out!!! FIX IT! If I could give it negative stars I without hesitation would. DO BOT GET THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR ACCOUNT

title: Release Notes Are Worthless
text:
How can the world’s largest software development company fail to include worthwhile release notes with its mobile app updates? Here’s what Microsoft continually states with each release: 

“We’re always working new features, bug fixes, and performance enhancements”. 

Seriously? That’s it? 

Your customers have been waiting for resolution to a documented bug to this app for a while now and we have no way of knowing whether your recent releases have resolved the issue without going through testing cycles. 

Please put forth 5 minutes of effort to summarize what has changed with each update...not just this app - all apps!

title: Over 10 platforms!
text: Very happy with the app, i have over 10 platforms with this services ,reliables and secure, highly recommended

title: App rejected my account
text: With the two point verification, during a reset of my password, the app was unable to recognize my account, with no other way to verify the system submitted me for a 30 day wait to reset - I can only assume by mail. Conversation with online customer support yielded no help and I got from them regarding my paid subscription with Xbox yielded in non- support phones and scanner ads.

title: Frustrating
text: At first for a few months it has been working correctly. But, when I had to install everything again on the phone it gives 8 digit numbers and the account I use it for is only asking me for 6 digits number.

title: Utterly obnoxious amount of hoops
text: I get it is a security app.   I get that it is supposed to make things less able to be hacked.    But i see absolutely no reason for this app to require my phone data.  No reason for there to be a REQUIREMENT on having notifications active.    There is enough data mining out there.   This is a bogus and absurd amount of a data breach.   Screw Microsoft.

title: Loop
text:
I changed my password due to my system needing a password change every 90 days, and, now, I’m stuck in a loop where myself nor my admin can grant me access to my email account. 

The app wants me to login. I input the correct information and it asks for verification from the app I'm already using. This is an inherent flaw and is quite frustrating.

title: Your app is crap
text: Every time I open it I have to login. When I do get signed in it tell me to open the app and sign in. Because of this the last week with getting in school work done has sucked because I can’t get in to even do my class work. So thanks for the F in my class. Y’all need to fix this or take your app off the market.

title: Excellent Authenticator
text: I try and use this as my primary Authenticator app. It works beautifully and have had no issues with it. It also backs up to iCloud so it’s easy to restore too.

title: WatchOs version doesnt support other accounts
text:
the watchOS version only shows notification for microsoft account , it doesnt support teo step password for other accounts. it would be great if  I could have access to my accounts in watchOS too
please work on this feature

title: App really wants to lock you out
text:
Authenticator app doesn't use icloud backup unless you enable it (unlike every other app on earth), and doesn't warn you about this in any way.
Because of this, I am now locked out of my Azure administration account because I had to reset my phone.

title: Security
text: A great app for online security. Someone was trying to hack me after an online purchase. I am using this to secure all my accounts!

title: Foolishness
text: I'm simply trying to log back into my work email. But outlook is telling me to go through my authenticator app. When I open said app, its telling me to go to my authenticator app (which I'm already on) and type in a number (which i have no prompt or way of doing so) to log back in. This is useless and such a waste of time.

title: Does not work and is mind-bogging my frustrating
text: This may just be the worst app I’ve ever used. When I try to set up my account, it asks for me to verify my account on the authenticator app. THIS *IS* THE AUTHENTICATOR APP. Absolutely frustrating. I resent my infrastructure that forces us to have Outlook accounts. All IT people hate it for a reason. So far removed from being user-friendly.

title: Easy
text: Works great when you have several accounts that require authentication.

title: Need to unlock 3 times to make it work?!
text:
Need to unlock 3 times before I can authenticate. I don’t see it’s necessity to do so.
Also the website url becomes lost and replaced with meaningless Microsoft authentication tool url after a day and I cannot even know what the page was. This is a deal breaker

title: Battery hot drain 10pct quickly when auth app 6.7.7 running
text: Microsoft please fix it asap in on iphone8, when Authenticator app running phone gets extremely hot and quickly drain away 10pct batter it’s almost unusable I see many complain about this issue on iPhone in the last few days all over the internet its serious

title: People have lost access to Coinbase funds using this
text:
I can’t believe the problem with Microsoft Authenticator giving 8 digit codes instead of 6 digit codes is still occurring, past a year.
People have lost thousands if not millions over Microsoft’s negligence.
Just fix the issue already so people can access their Coinbase funds and remove you from the app.

title: high hopes but restore from backup is buggy
text: i had high hopes that this would be the best one out there supporting all the hashes others have had trouble with as well as having the easiest backup solution i’ve found. unfortunately restoring from backup is almost entirely useless as the app consistently crashes upon restore. while some entries are restored after multiple attempts i’ve never gotten 100% unfortunately. not sure if it’s a scaling issue (i have around 40+ entries)?

title: Horrible
text: I can’t access a very important website and of course I can’t call them. This app has zero tech help. My last phone broke so I downloaded the app again but the codes don’t work with what I already had set up on my other phone. I need access to the website and this is so frustrating to say the least..

title: Still broken
text:
The app tells me to open Authenticator when I’m already in Authenticator and the only option is to authenticate by text which completely defeats them purpose of this stupid app.
Other reviews indicate that I’m not the only person this is happening to and I have already sent multiple bug reports to Microsoft.

title: Backup/restore
text: Works great until you have to move to a new device. What a joke. Google authenticate is the way to go.

title: Worst decision ever
text: We use office 365 for my work which is great!  But when the Authenticator started most people stopped being able to get into their accounts and if the Authenticator glitches it will require you to authenticate from a signed in Authenticator that isn’t signed in anywhere else.  Basically just sending you in circles.
